snippet: For an art exhibition in Los Angeles, the painter Mark Ryden produced a record of some of his pop-music friends performing a 19th-century song.
abstract: For an art exhibition in Los Angeles, the painter Mark Ryden produced a record of some of his pop-music friends performing a 19th-century song.

headline.main: An Offbeat Gallery Show With Its Own Soundtrack
headline.print_headline: An Offbeat Gallery Show  With Its Own Soundtrack
